name: Time Wasting
description:
A game inspired by Cookie Clicker and Universal Paper Clip. Waste your time in this precious world and feel the pleasure of wasting time for no obvious goal. :)

Tutorial Help : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHbBjML3iwhHQN1cuNGxE1JxfTFBSlma0
